item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH About To Break Higher? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH About To Break Higher? - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price after finding buyers below $14.00 started to move higher, and currently looks set to break a major resistance. Ethereum price after finding buyers below $14.00 started to move higher, and currently looks set to break a major resistance. Ethereum price slowly and steadily moving higher against the US dollar, and looks set for more upsides.

item.title: What is Ethereum?
item.description:
What is Ethereum?

Sanders definitely has a chance. It's entirely possible that Clinton could drop out of the race for some reason. A health issue, a scandal, a major gaffe, a press revelation could all take their toll and she could be forced to pull out. And then Sanders is pretty much the man.

item.title: The Crypto Show: Brexit & The DAO with Jeff Berwick, Daniel Krawiz, Brian Deery and Christopher David.
item.description:
The Crypto Show: Brexit & The DAO with Jeff Berwick, Daniel Krawiz, Brian Deery and Christopher David.

The first hour we talk with Jeff Berwick about Brexit, Bitcoin, Bilderberg and his plans for Anarchapulco 2017. Then talk with Chris David about the kick off Arcade City drivers implementing Unsung.org . It was a huge success. Then we talk with Daniel Krawiz and Brian Deery about the failure of the DAO and the pitfalls of Ethereum.

item.title: Three Hacked Hospital Databases Up For Sale On Deep Web
item.description:
Three Hacked Hospital Databases Up For Sale On Deep Web

A new week has started, which also means there is a brand new data breach to discuss. One hacker managed to obtain over 650,000 healthcare records using an exploit in the Remote Desktop Protocol used by an institution. Although it remains unclear as to which hospital was attacked, this story goes to show how lackluster IT security keeps plaguing the healthcare industry.

item.title: The 1% don't use Bitcoin Exchanges
item.description:
The 1% don't use Bitcoin Exchanges

Given that the Brexit is still fresh in our minds - the big question of "how will the global financial elite diversify their assets" is one that every money manager and their clients are discussing this weekend. Great timing for a Bitcoin post! I sent a tweet out earlier this morning (followed by a tweet storm!)

item.title: Bitcoin was 'Good as Gold' in the Brexit - Breitbart
item.description:
Bitcoin was 'Good as Gold' in the Brexit - Breitbart

Supporters have claimed that Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are the ideal protection from the destructive policies of central banks and their " fiat " currencies. They highlight that when the US Federal Reserve was founded by an Act of Congress in 1913, the official price of an ounce of gold was $20.64.

item.title: The Bitcoin Podcast: TBP68 - Deconstructing theDAO Attack
item.description:
The Bitcoin Podcast: TBP68 - Deconstructing theDAO Attack

Emin Gün Sirer is a great mind and future thinker for CryptoCurrency, smart contracts and DAOs. I'm also supporting his stance to start working on DAO 2.0 in an organized manner. The statements from the Cornell computer scientist on this episode come amid broad concern over developments at The DAO.

item.title: Ethereum: Gas, Fuel, and Fees
item.description:
Ethereum: Gas, Fuel, and Fees

Ethereum is a platform for decentralized and truthful applications that run on a global, peer-to-peer network without any administrators or a single point of failure. These applications have zero downtime and anyone can create them: it is permissionless innovation. The applications are truthful, immutable and always interoperate as they are coded.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Kicking Off A Volatile Week
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Kicking Off A Volatile Week

Here's what we are looking at as we head into what could be a volatile week in the bitcoin price market. We've had a pretty crazy few weeks in the bitcoin price space, and this has translated to some volatility in the effectiveness of our strategy.

item.title: Buyer Beware! The Definitive OneCoin Ponzi Exposé
item.description:
Buyer Beware! The Definitive OneCoin Ponzi Exposé

Bitcoin.com chatted with Tim Tayshun, owner and operator of ezCoinAccess, who has been in the industry for quite some time. Tayshun gives our readers a definitive well-researched synopsis of the alleged ponzi and cryptocurrency MLM scandal called Onecoin.
